alert.note: Alert for Coastal Liberty; Coastal McIntosh; Inland Liberty; Inland McIntosh (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 3:25PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF MCINTOSH COUNTY... At 325 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Everett, or 10 miles west of Darien, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph and excessive cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. All outdoor activities should cease. Move indoors immediately. Some locations in the path of this storm include... Darien, Wolf Island, Eulonia, Valona, Little Saint Simons Island, Cox, Meridian and Townsend. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Excessive cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 15 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.
